programme.title: NIGHTOUT
programme.desc: An extensive compilation of some of the catchiest foot-tapping hits from various musical artists is played back to back.

programme.title: Beetey Lamhey
programme.desc: A comprehensive compilation of some of the most popular and beloved songs from the 90s is played back to back to entertain the audience and evoke nostalgia.

programme.title: SUNRISE HITS
programme.desc: A comprehensive compilation of some of the most popular and catchy Bollywood songs by renowned singers and musicians is played back to back to entertain the audience.

programme.title: Likes Bajao
programme.desc: Viewers from across the country vote for some of their most favourite songs on social media, which are played back to back.

programme.title: PYAAR HITS
programme.desc: A compilation of some of the most iconic songs based on the theme of love, composed by popular artists and musicians, is played back-to-back.
